content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (7.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts" )
( ing-1 "1 small onion, finely chopped" )
( ing-2 "1 garlic clove, minced" )
( ing-3 "4 eggs, beaten" )
( ing-4 "1/4 cup dry bread crumbs" )
( ing-5 "1/4 teaspoon ground mustard" )
( ing-6 "1/8 teaspoon dried oregano" )
( ing-7 "1/8 teaspoon pepper" )
( ing-8 "1/8 teaspoon hot pepper sauce" )
( ing-9 "2 (8 ounce) packages shredded Cheddar cheese" )
( ing-10 "2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley" )

content.text: 0) Drain artichokes, reserving half of the marinade.
2) In a skillet, saute onion and garlic in reserved marinade until tender; set aside.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "saute"@17:22 / AC
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a skillet"@6:15 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "onion"@23:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "garlic"@33:39 / FOOD )
		:loc ( "reserved marinade"@43:60 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until tender"@61:73 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "set aside"@75:84 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) In a large bowl, combine the egg, bread crumbs, mustard, oregano, pepper and hot pepper sauce.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "In a large bowl"@3:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "the egg"@28:35 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "bread crumbs"@37:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "mustard"@51:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "oregano"@60:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "pepper"@69:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "hot pepper sauce"@80:96 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Stir in the cheese, parsley, reserved artichokes and onion mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "the cheese"@11:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "parsley"@23:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "reserved artichokes"@32:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "onion mixture"@56:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Fill miniature muffin cups three-fourths full.
6) Bake at 325 degrees F for 15-17 minutes or until set.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-6-0 "325 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "15-17 minutes"@29:42 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until set"@46:55 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to wire racks.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Cool"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "5 minutes"@12:21 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-7-0 "before removing from pan to wire racks"@22:60 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
